body_html: @vrv @jendap OK, I re-created /var/lib/docker on the android slave and restarted the docker service. The problem seems to be gone for now. Why the file systems became read-only in docker containers is still unclear to me. If you have any thoughts or clues, please let me know. We'll keep an eye on the android builds.

body: @vrv @jendap OK, I re-created /var/lib/docker on the android slave and restarted the docker service. The problem seems to be gone for now. Why the file systems became read-only in docker containers is still unclear to me. If you have any thoughts or clues, please let me know. We'll keep an eye on the android builds.
